To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RiseFallThreeMethods _risefallthreemethods;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_risefallthreemethods = RiseFallThreeMethods(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_risefallthreemethods.IsReady)
{
    var current = _risefallthreemethods.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.risefallthreemethods = self.RiseFallThreeMethods(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.risefallthreemethods.IsReady:
    current = self.risefallthreemethods.Current.Value
